snippet.title: Swift: YouTube -  How to Load Images Async in UICollectionView (Ep 6)
snippet.description:
Let's take a look at how we can improve our applications to load images asynchronously while still being able to scroll a list view.  This is a common issue that iOS developers run into and I'll show you how to cache images and then check to see if the request finished on the correct cell.

Part 1 YouTube Home Feed: https://youtu.be/3Xv1mJvwXok
Part 2 Custom Navigation Bar: https://youtu.be/APQVltARKF8
Part 3 Custom Tab Bar / Menu Bar: https://youtu.be/rRhJGnSmEKQ
Part 4 MVC Explained: https://youtu.be/Zud56x_VYvs
Part 5 REST JSON Integration: https://youtu.be/WjrvcGAZfoI

Completed Source Code:
https://www.letsbuildthatapp.com/course/youtube
